meanings.definition: To request or reserve in advance
meanings.sent1: She bespeaks a table for two at the restaurant.
meanings.sent2: He bespeaks a room at the hotel for the weekend.
meanings.sent3: I bespeak a copy of the book before it sells out.
meanings.sent4: The early reservation bespeaks their eagerness for the event.
meanings.sent5: The phone call bespeaks their intention to attend the meeting.
